name: Comet Cruiser
description:
Comet Cruiser is an arcade game inspired by retro games of the past and playing games past your bedtime. It was a lot of fun creating this simple but AESTHETIC  little game. I created all of the art/ sound effects, and programmed the game using Unity. I really hope that you enjoy playing it! See how long you can last travelling through space!

KEYBOARD/MOUSE CONTROLS:

  • Move: WASD keys or ARROW keys
  • Dash: Move left or right + SPACEBAR
  • Select: Mouse click or ENTER key.

XBOX CONTROLLER:

  • Move: Left Joystick
  • Dash: 'X' BUTTON
  • Select: 'A' BUTTON
